original_text: Then they had the Feast of Huts, as the law said they should do. On each day of the feast they made the right number of burnt offerings.
korean_text: 기록된 규례대로 초막절을 지켜 번제를 매일 정수대로 날마다 드리고

sentences.original_text: Then they had the Feast of Huts
as the law said they should do
sentences.korean_translation: 율법이 말한 대로 그들이 해야 할 대로

sentences.original_text: On each day of the feast
they made the right number of burnt offerings
